Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties and methods of <font face="courier new">PrinterSettings</font> class against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: This method provides the printer settings information in string format.
This property indicates the last page number to print.
This property indicates the names of all printers installed on the machine.
This property identifies the printer for printing.
This property identifies the file, while printing to a file.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(5), (B)-(4), (C)-(1), (D)-(2), and (E)-(3).
